name: Turtle Cowboys
description:
Mash the button as fast as you can to escape prison on your tortoise steed! Shoot at the lead cowboy to slow them down and inch your way to freedom! Play with up to 3 friends!!!!!!! You’ll have a blast!!!!!1!1!!!

For the best results, change the graphics settings to fantastic and make sure the screen the game is being played on is 16:9 resolution.

[Controller required to play]

Created by some of Falling Cat Studios in 24 hours as part of the 2015 Midwest Game Jam:

Bob Vogt - Lead Programming

Shane Yach - Programming and Music/Sound

April Jane - Art
